header.title: Medical Enquiry Form
header.subtitle: Securely share your medical reports and treatment requirements for coordinated healthcare access

success.title: Medical Enquiry Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for submitting your medical enquiry through our secure enquiry form. Our coordination team will review your medical information and contact you within 24 hours to discuss the next steps for case review coordination with partner hospitals.

form.title: Medical Enquiry Form
form.description: Patients securely share medical reports and treatment requirements through our enquiry form. All patient information is handled confidentially and disclosed only to authorized healthcare providers strictly for care coordination purposes.

fields.referral: How did you hear about us?

step2.title: Medical Information
step2.subtitle: Step 2 of 3 - Share your medical details

department.label: Treatment Department / Specialty
department.placeholder: Select a Treatment Department or Specialty
department.help: Select the medical specialty for your treatment needs

condition.label: Specific Medical Condition / Diagnosis
condition.help: If you have a diagnosed condition, please specify
condition.placeholder: e.g., Coronary artery disease, Knee osteoarthritis, Breast cancer, Type 2 diabetes
condition.note: This helps us coordinate with appropriate specialists for case review

history.label: Medical History & Treatment Requirements
history.placeholder:
Please provide details about:
• Current symptoms and duration
• Previous medical diagnoses
• Current medications and dosages
• Past surgeries, treatments, or hospitalizations
• Results of recent medical tests
• Any known allergies or adverse reactions
• Family medical history (if relevant)
• Specific treatment requirements or preferences
history.help: Detailed information helps in case review coordination with hospitals

upload.title: Medical Reports & Documents
upload.subtitle: Upload relevant medical files for case review (Optional)
upload.hint: Max 10MB per file • Secure and confidential
upload.uploadHelp: Click to upload or drag & drop your medical files
upload.note: Medical details are shared with appropriate partner hospitals and specialists for evaluation as part of our case review coordination.

step2.confidentiality: Your medical information is handled confidentially for care coordination

step3.title: Review & Submit Medical Enquiry
step3.subtitle: Please review your information before submitting for case review coordination

consent.title: Consent & Agreements
consent.subtitle: Required for case review coordination
consent.privacyText: I consent to MedEminence collecting and processing my personal and medical information for the purpose of medical case review coordination. I understand this information will be shared only with authorized healthcare providers for care coordination purposes.
consent.communicationText: I agree to receive updates regarding my medical case review and coordination via email and phone.
consent.privacyError: You must accept the privacy consent to submit your enquiry

disclaimer.title: Important Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: MedEminence is a medical tourism facilitation and healthcare coordination platform. We do not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. All clinical decisions and treatment plans are determined exclusively by licensed healthcare providers. Information on this website is for general informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice.
